Summary: Light next to what i think was Venus to the south by southeast that was brighter than Venus.
divs: sighting detailsi walked outside the south exit of this building to see stationary light that resembled a helicopter search light. after staring at it for a few minutes, it dimmed and began to move slowly south and then faded out. no strobes or red\green lights to speak of sky was clear and other stars visible. i'm reporting in case someone else saw it in the area. also no sound.
